BIO

I have been doing projects related to software development and design since 3 years. I can provide services such as Website Development, Application Development (Desktop Software), Web scrapping, Website Design, Mobile UI Design and work related to graphics which includes Logo Design, Image tracing, editing etc. I am very detailed oriented, hardworking and organized.
